scripts.start:vue: npm run install:vue && npm run docker && docker compose up hitpoints-ui-vue -d && npm --prefix ./hitpoints-ui-react-vue run start
scripts.start:react: npm run install:react && npm run docker && docker compose up hitpoints-ui-react -d && npm --prefix ./hitpoints-ui-react run start
scripts.start:react-native: npm run install:react-native && npm run docker && docker compose up hitpoints-api-express -d && npm --prefix ./hitpoints-ui-react-native run start
scripts.docker: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache
scripts.install: npm run install:vue && npm run install:react && npm run install:react-native
